title: Music from a League-inspired fan fiction: The Grimoires
body:
Hello. Since August I've been writing a League-inspired fan fiction. For each chapter I write a small song to accompany the text, and I've just released chapter 7.

If you're interested in checking out the music [some of which is based on League of Legends theme songs :)], here's the music page where you can download some mp3s: http://thegrimoires.com/music/. 

What do you think?

replies.body:
I've been listening to these all morning while checking and writing e-mails - awesome job!

Keep it up! =)
